summary: This adds 3 Thieve\'s Guild \"doyens\" to the game.  They are not quest givers. However, they can remove player bounties for half cost. You must be a member of the Thieve\'s Guild to use their services.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Thieve\'s Guild Doyens


------------------------------------------------------
Author: MojoDaJojo

------------------------------------------------------

0: Name / Author
1: Thanks / Credits
2: Requirements
3: Description
4: Installation / Uninstallation
5: Version History / Bug Fixes
6: Incompatibilities / Known Issues
7: Legal

------------------------------------------------------
1: Thanks/Credits

Bethesda - For making games that someone as challenged as me can mod.

The Nexus - For a hassle free place to upload my mods.


------------------------------------------------------
2: Requirements



------------------------------------------------------
3: Description

Adds 3 Thieve\'s Guild \"doyens\" to the game.  They are not quest givers.  
They are, however, a way for the player to remove all bounties for half price.  
You must belong to the Thieve\'s Guild to use their services.  

Dag the Knacker can be found in Markarth in the Silver-Blood Inn
Raw-Rube Ruby is in the Ragged Flagon in Riften.  
Latra Casta is in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.


------------------------------------------------------
4: Installation / Uninstallation

Install:

Merge the data file from the mod with the one in your Skyrim folder.


Uninstall:

Remove the files that came with the mod.
An easy way to do this would be to copy, (not cut),
the files into the folder a second time, and overwrite everything.
Now hit undo.
Assuming you\'re using windows this will delete the necessary files.


------------------------------------------------------
5: Version History / Bug Fixes

.91:

1. The npcs are now scripted to move out of their starting cell.

   They stopped doing as of some Beth. patch or another.  

2. Exported FaceGen data as there faces had acquired gray/black.

3. Removed update.esm as a master with TES5Edit.  

   I had unintentionally added it while working on the above stuff.

___

.915:

1. Included the mesh files for the facegen data.  

   .91 only had the textures so you were probably still getting black face issue.


------------------------------------------------------
6: Incompatibilities / Known Issues

If you have a high bounty in the same city where you paid a doyen, 
the guards may still pursue you until you\'ve fast traveled away and back.  



------------------------------------------------------
7: Legal

 
I don\'t care what is done with any of the parts of this, 
but you must follow the rules set by Bethesda and/or wherever you upload the file.
author: MojoDaJojo

files.name: TG Doyens Dot91
files.changelogHtml:
1. The npcs are now scripted to move out of their starting cell. They stopped doing as of some Beth. patch or another.
2. Exported FaceGen data as there faces had acquired gray/black.
3. Removed update.esm as a master with TES5Edit.
